mapper.update: update identity_check set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkerid = #{checkerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ifchecked = #{ifchecked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repeat = #{repeat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userid, usertype, checkerid, ifchecked, repeat from identity_check
